CustomField.inlineHelpText: All-in-one score that ranks accounts by propensity to generate pipeline and leverages engagement activity, account whitespace per product, profile match and 3rd party signals. Score is between 0 - 6 and is generated for all accounts. 1 - very low whitespace and engagement. 3 - average mix of engagement and whitespace. 5 - very hot accounts with good whitespace or average engagement but very high whitespace potential. 6 is an override score - details in the Rationale field
CustomField.label: [Deprecated] Account Priority Score
